name: UNNotificationCategoryOptions
desc: Constants indicating how to handle notifications associated with this category.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Initializes a notification category options object using the specified raw value.

items.name: static var customDismissAction: UNNotificationCategoryOptions
items.desc: Send dismiss actions to the UNUserNotificationCenter object’s delegate for handling.

items.name: static var allowInCarPlay: UNNotificationCategoryOptions
items.desc: Allow CarPlay to display notifications of this type.

items.name: static var hiddenPreviewsShowTitle: UNNotificationCategoryOptions
items.desc: Show the notification’s title, even if the user has disabled notification previews for the app.

items.name: static var hiddenPreviewsShowSubtitle: UNNotificationCategoryOptions
items.desc: Show the notification’s subtitle, even if the user has disabled notification previews for the app.
